entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
